title: Classic and Renovated Units - $500 OFF until Aug 15th Call to Inquire!
posting_body: ['Come home to convenient living at The Harmon at 370 Apartments in Las Vegas, NV.', 'Enjoy life with easy access to transportation, shopping, entertainment, and City Center.', 'Choose from two very efficient apartment floor plans, ready for you to move in.', 'We have an amazing pool and fitness center.', 'The Harmon at 370 Apartments is right where you want to be, centrally located and in the center of everything Las Vegas.', 'Give us a call, schedule a tour online, or stop in today for your personal tour.', '-Clothes Care Center', '-Two Oversized Resort Style Swimming Pools', '-Vertical Blind Window Coverings', '-Electric Oven / Range', '-Refrigerator with Freezer', '-Bathtub with shower', '-Non-Smoking', '-Carpet / Vinyl Flooring', '-Professional Management', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
